explains: n. 雪崩，山崩；突然出现的大量事物；大量崩塌物；（物理）（电子或离子）雪崩
v. 雪崩，山崩；涌入；被雪崩吞没或冲走；（物理）（由于电子雪崩而）电导率突增
wordGroup: avalanche photodiode 雪崩光电二极管

sentences.en: The survivors of the avalanche included 12 Britons.
sentences.cn: 雪崩的幸存者中有12名英国人。

sentences.en: More than a dozen people were dug out of the avalanche alive.
sentences.cn: 十多个埋在雪崩下的人活着被挖了出来。

sentences.en: The avalanche forced its way down the mountain, crushing everything in its path.
sentences.cn: 雪崩冲下山来，摧毁了沿途的一切。
